title: Mercury Transit in the 11th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 11th house for Scorpio Ascendant, thinking becomes goal-oriented, social, and strategically focused on gains. Communication with friends, networks, and professional circles increases, opening doors through ideas and connections. Planning for income, targets, and future growth becomes sharper. However, over-calculation or excessive expectation from others can create mental pressure. When used consciously, this transit supports intelligent networking, profitable discussions, and clear goal setting without mental dependency on approval.
